subtotal.title: Subtotal
subtotal.description: Sum of all line totals (i.e. taxes not included) (calculated, maps to `SubTotal`).

total.title: Total
total.description: Grand total after taxes have been applied (calculated, maps to `Total`).

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: List of fuel purchases made with the customer's e-wallets (maps to `Conceptos`).

FuelAccountBalance.description: FuelAccountBalance carries the data to produce a CFDI's "Complemento de Estado de Cuenta de Combustibles para Monederos Electr√≥nicos" (version 1.2 revision B) providing detailed information about fuel purchases made with electronic wallets.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of fuel (one of `c_ClaveTipoCombustible` codes, maps to `TipoCombustible`).

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Reference unit of measure used in the price and the quantity (maps to `Unidad`).

price.title: Price
price.description: Base price of a single unit of the fuel without taxes (maps to `ValorUnitario`).

FuelAccountItem.description: FuelAccountItem provides the details of a fuel purchase.

i.title: Index
i.description: Index of the line starting from 1 (calculated)

e_wallet_id.title: E-wallet Identifier
e_wallet_id.description: Identifier of the e-wallet used to make the purchase (maps to `Identificador`).

purchase_date_time.title: Purchase Date and Time
purchase_date_time.description: Date and time of the purchase (maps to `Fecha`).

vendor_tax_code.title: Vendor's Tax Identity Code
vendor_tax_code.description: Tax Identity Code of the fuel's vendor (maps to `Rfc`)

service_station_code.title: Service Station Code
service_station_code.description: Code of the service station where the purchase was made (maps to `ClaveEstacion`).

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Amount of fuel units purchased (maps to `Cantidad`)

total.title: Total
total.description: Result of quantity multiplied by the unit price (maps to `Importe`).

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Map of taxes applied to the purchase (maps to `Traslados`).

FuelAccountLine.description: FuelAccountLine represents a single fuel purchase made with an e-wallet issued by the invoice's supplier.

cat.title: Category
cat.description: Category that identifies the tax ("VAT" or "IEPS", maps to `Impuesto`)

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percent applicable to the line total (tasa) to use instead of Rate (maps to `TasaoCuota`)

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: Rate is a fixed fee to apply to the line quantity (cuota) (maps to `TasaOCuota`)

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total amount of the tax once the percent or rate has been applied (maps to `Importe`).

FuelAccountTax.description: FuelAccountTax represents a single tax applied to a fuel purchase.
